Package org.opentcs.util.communication.tcp

Utility classes for handling TCP connections.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionStateListener
    Implemented by classes that wish to be notified when the state of a connection changed.
    IncomingTelegram
    A marker interface for classes/objects that represent telegrams received from a vehicle.
    IncomingTelegramHandler
    Implemented by classes that are capable of handling telegrams received from a peer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveTcpConnection
    A TCP connection to a peer with the peer being the server.
    ByteSequenceDissector<E>
    Takes a stream of bytes and constructs objects from it.
    DummyTcpConnection
    A dummy TCP connection, not really connecting to any peer.
    PassiveTcpConnection
    A TCP connection to a peer with the peer being the client.
    TcpConnection
    A connection to a peer.

Package org.opentcs.util.communication.tcp Description

Utility classes for handling TCP connections.
